q1.question: How long does a typical project take?
q1.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity. A simple website can take 4-6 weeks, while a full mobile app typically takes 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

q2.question: What is your pricing model?
q2.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including fixed-price and time & materials. Pricing depends on project scope, complexity, and timeline. Contact us for a personalized quote tailored to your needs.

q3.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive maintenance packages that include bug fixes, updates, security patches, performance optimization, and feature enhancements. Your success is our priority.

q4.question: Can you work with our existing team?
q4.answer: Absolutely! We collaborate seamlessly with in-house teams, providing expertise where needed. We integrate smoothly into your workflow and complement your existing resources.

q5.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
q5.answer: We specialize in modern web and mobile technologies including React, Next.js, React Native, Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and leading cloud platforms like Vercel and Supabase.

meta.description: Learn how Dream Studio collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: At Dream Studio, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
introduction.p2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you:

name.title: Contact Information
name.desc: Name, email address, phone number, and company name

email.title: Communication Data
email.desc: Any information you provide when contacting us

phone.desc: Information about your project requirements and needs

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.desc: IP address, browser type, device information, and usage analytics

items.respond: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer service

items.improve: Understand how you use our website to improve user experience

storage.title: Data Storage and Security
storage.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption and security protocols.
storage.p2: We use Twenty CRM to manage contact information and Vercel for analytics. These third-party services have their own privacy policies governing the use of your information.

items.access: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
items.correct: Correct any inaccurate or incomplete information
items.delete: Request deletion of your personal data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.p1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and improve user experience. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

meta.title: Terms of Service | Dream Studio
meta.description: Read our terms of service and understand the agreement between Dream Studio and our clients.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: These Terms of Service govern your use of Dream Studio's website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

services.title: Our Services
services.p1: Dream Studio provides the following professional services:

items.web: Web application development using modern frameworks
items.mobile: Mobile application development for iOS and Android
items.design: UI/UX design and product design services

proposals.title: Proposals and Contracts
proposals.desc: All projects begin with a detailed proposal outlining scope, timeline, and costs. A signed contract is required before work begins.

timeline.title: Project Timeline
timeline.desc: Timelines are estimates and may vary based on project complexity and client responsiveness. Delays caused by late client feedback may extend the timeline.

changes.title: Scope Changes
changes.desc: Changes to project scope after contract signing may result in additional costs and timeline adjustments.

items.deposit: A deposit (typically 50%) is required before work begins
items.milestones: Payment milestones are outlined in the project proposal
items.late: Late payments may result in project suspension
items.refunds: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.p1: Upon full payment, all deliverables and custom code become the property of the client. Dream Studio retains the right to showcase the project in our portfolio unless otherwise agreed.
ip.p2: We retain ownership of any pre-existing code, frameworks, or tools used in the project. The client receives a license to use these as part of the delivered solution.

warranties.title: Warranties and Support
warranties.p1: We provide a warranty period (typically 30-90 days) for bug fixes and issues directly related to our work. This does not cover changes to project requirements or third-party services.
warranties.p2: Ongoing maintenance and support can be arranged under a separate agreement.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.p1: Dream Studio is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our total liability is limited to the amount paid for services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.p1: Either party may terminate the agreement with written notice. The client is responsible for payment for all work completed up to the termination date.
